_meta.description: Curated MCP servers for the multi-agent system. All free, open-source, no API keys required unless noted.
security_notes: All MCP servers run as stdio subprocesses — isolated per invocation
Filesystem server has explicit allowed-paths — never grant /
Git server operates on repositories you specify — no remote push without explicit config
Fetch server respects robots.txt by default
No MCP server here has network listen ports unless explicitly started as SSE
_meta.architecture: MCP servers communicate via JSON-RPC over stdio. Send initialize → tools/list → tools/call

fetch.name: MCP Fetch
fetch.description: Fetch any URL and convert to markdown/text for LLM consumption. Respects robots.txt.

git.name: MCP Git
git.description: Full git operations — status, diff, commit, branch, log, show. Works on any local repo.

filesystem.name: MCP Filesystem
filesystem.args_note: Append allowed directories as arguments: npx -y mcp-server-filesystem /path1 /path2
filesystem.description: Secure file operations — read, write, move, search, directory listing. Sandboxed to specified paths.
filesystem.security: Only allows access to explicitly listed directories

memory.name: MCP Memory
memory.description: Knowledge graph-based persistent memory system. Stores entities, relations, observations.

sequential_thinking.name: MCP Sequential Thinking
sequential_thinking.description: Dynamic problem-solving through structured thought sequences. Chain-of-thought reasoning tool.

time.name: MCP Time
time.description: Time and timezone conversion, current time queries.

everything.name: MCP Everything
everything.description: Reference/test server demonstrating all MCP capabilities — prompts, resources, tools.

playwright.name: Playwright MCP
playwright.description: Official Microsoft Playwright MCP server. Browser automation via structured accessibility snapshots.

sqlite.name: SQLite MCP
sqlite.description: Database interaction — query, schema inspection, business intelligence on SQLite databases.

postgres.name: PostgreSQL MCP
postgres.description: Read-only database access with schema inspection for PostgreSQL.

docker.name: Docker MCP (community)
docker.description: Docker container management — list, start, stop, logs, exec commands in containers.

brave_search.name: Brave Search MCP
brave_search.description: Web and local search using Brave's Search API.

knowledge_graph.name: MCP Memory (Knowledge Graph)
knowledge_graph.description: Build and query knowledge graphs with entities and relations. Persistent across sessions.

kubernetes.name: Kubernetes MCP
kubernetes.description: K8s cluster operations — pods, deployments, services, logs.

terraform.name: Terraform MCP
terraform.description: Provider discovery, module analysis, Registry API integration for IaC workflows.

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare MCP
cloudflare.description: Deploy and manage Cloudflare Workers, KV, R2, D1.

github.name: GitHub MCP
github.description: Repository management, file operations, PRs, issues via GitHub API.

slack.name: Slack MCP
slack.description: Channel management, messaging, search in Slack workspaces.

notion.name: Notion MCP
notion.description: Create and manage Notion pages, databases, blocks.

urlhaus.name: URLhaus (via fetch MCP)
urlhaus.description: Query malware URL database via the fetch MCP server calling urlhaus-api.abuse.ch.

alpaca.name: Alpaca Trading MCP
alpaca.description: Trade stocks/options, analyze market data via Alpaca API.

coingecko_mcp.name: CoinGecko MCP
coingecko_mcp.description: Crypto price and market data across 200+ blockchain networks.
